description: Creates a new maintenance configuration or replaces an existing table bucket policy for a table bucket. For more information, see Adding a table bucket policy in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:PutTableBucketPolicy permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

parameters.name: resourcePolicy
parameters.description: The JSON that defines the policy.
